sentences.en: 'Three,'reckoned the captain,'ourselves make seven , counting Hawkins, here.
sentences.cn: “ 他们有三个人, ” 船长计算着, “ 加上我们就有七个人, 这当然包括霍金斯在内.

sentences.en: He began counting them and then, with growing perplexity, counted them a second time.
sentences.cn: 他开始数，然后更加困惑，于是又数了一遍。

sentences.en: He's counting on his mother to take care of the twins for him; she's had plenty of experience with them.
sentences.cn: 他靠母亲帮忙照顾他的双胞胎；她在这方面很有经验。

sentences.en: How to lists the maximum of counting with where syntax?
sentences.cn: 如何列出了计算的最大语法在哪里?。

sentences.en: I'm counting on you to help me through!
sentences.cn: 我正指望你帮忙帮到底呢!

sentences.en: I'm counting on you to persuade her.
I've tried a hot drink at bedtime and counting sheep, but I just can't seem to get to sleep these days.
sentences.cn: 我已试过在睡觉前喝些热饮料和心里计数的方法, 但目前我似乎就是睡不着.

sentences.en: If not I can still rely on counting popsicles — it might not please the sight, but thank god I seldom do statistics now.
sentences.cn: 不会打算盘的可以拣冰棍棍儿计数——满地拣棍儿是有点难看，但是——谢天谢地，我现在很少作统计了。

sentences.en: Many people act on impulse without counting the cost.
sentences.cn: 很多人不考虑后果就莽撞行事。

sentences.en: No sugar for me, thanks—I'm counting my calories .
sentences.cn: 我不要糖，谢谢。我在控制摄取的热量。

sentences.en: She was counting out 30p, mostly in small change, into my hand.
sentences.cn: 她数出了30便士——大部分是零钱——递给了我。

sentences.en: The military equipment captured was beyond counting.
sentences.cn: 缴获的武器装备不可胜数.

sentences.en: The whole world was counting down to the new millennium.
sentences.cn: 全世界都在倒计时迎接新千年的到来.

sentences.en: There are five pieces of luggage, not counting the medical kit.
sentences.cn: 一共5件行李, 药箱除外.

sentences.en: There are thirty people in the classroom, counting the teacher.
sentences.cn: 把老师算上,教室里有30个人.

sentences.en: There is a 1,700-year-old tea tree still living in southern China which is more than 100 feet tall and counting.
sentences.cn: 中国南方生长着一棵已有1,700年历史的茶树，高100多英尺，而且还在不断长高。

sentences.en: You must be accurate in counting.
You must not peek while you are counting in such games as hide - and - seek.
sentences.cn: 象 捉 迷藏一类游戏中,你数数时绝对不能偷看.

words.tran_cn: 计数器，计算器；柜台；计算者

trans.tran_cn: （按顺序）数( count的现在分词)，有价值，数出总数，算得上
